response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its unique features and benefits. Considering its unmatched capabilities and the value it can bring to your endeavors, I kindly invite you to seize this opportunity to acquire it at this exclusive price.
